html:a.title: Install Custom Icons for CB Editor

html:div.html:a:
XML created with
CB Context Menu Extended

custombutton.name: Custom Icons for CB Editor
custombutton.help:
𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗻𝗼𝘁𝗲𝘀 ⚫ This button can be cloned/installed as much as you need/want. ⚫ Start adding your images 𝗮𝗳𝘁𝗲𝗿 the comma surrounded by squared brackets. ⚫ An image can be any type of image a Custom Button supports.
